name: Miscellaneous Publishing and Printing
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants engaged in wholesale printing, publishing, or bookbinding.
Examples of materials produced by such merchants include books,
periodicals, magazines, maps and atlases, business newsletters,
directories, sheet music, paper patterns, technical manuals and
papers, telephone directories, and yearbooks.
For wholesale distributors of books, pamphlets, and educational
materials, use MCC 5192.
